content: The former Miss Universe and actor, Sushmita Sen has proven that age is only a number on several occasions. Many people admire her and consider her as an inspiration. A couple of her fitness secrets are listed below. To know more, swipe away.
title: Sushmita Sen’s fitness secrets

content: The stunning actress, Disha Patani is a complete fitness freak who enjoys various forms of workouts. She has maintained her toned body by following a strict diet plan apart from working out every day. Here are ten tips to make a note of from the diva’s fitness regime.
title: Fitness lessons from Disha Patani
